channel.title: Who is furthest from spawn?
channel.description:
I'm going to set a world border on the main world as well, who is farthest from spawn so you won't be locked out from your home?
Spawn is: X: 144.5 Z: 161.5
How far from it are you? Currently, I have the border set at 5000.

item.title: Who is furthest from spawn?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

I have a small base at (8192, 8192) but it’s negligible. There’s nothing out there that I need.

Read full topic

item.title: Who is furthest from spawn?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

PvP only at night will be enabled when that plugin is added.

Read full topic

item.title: Who is furthest from spawn?
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“Niall, post:29, topic:416326”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=518255.msg3775289#msg3775289 date=1318038113]

edit: just realised the worlds are seperate

double edit: why is world 2 so small? I reached the world limit around 800 on Z

also hit the world limit at x131, z -356

It’s like the above said, it’s 1000x1000 because people wanted another small world where people could live in harmony like hippies (peace, love, the whole nine yards)
[/quote]

aw, no strongholds then? :P[/quote]

Not until we expand, the strongholds on this map are just outside the 1000x1000 barrier.

Read full topic

item.title: Who is furthest from spawn?
item.dc:creator: @PuppyClubber PuppyClubber
item.description:
@PuppyClubber wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:19, topic:416326”][quote author=PuppyClubber link=topic=518255.msg3767608#msg3767608 date=1317370081]
i don’t think i’m anywhere near 10k, but I’m just curious why we’re putting on a border?
[/quote]

The farther out you are in the map the more memory it takes. This is what overloads the server and eventually causes it to crash because he needs to put more memory towards the server. Bordering it is a good idea.[/quote]

Okay thanks, was just curious.

Read full topic

item.title: Who is furthest from spawn?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:22, topic:416326”]It’s still set at 8000, which I think is fine for now.

(it makes the square 16000x16000, do we really need more space?)[/quote]

can you expand it to 16k tiles out for a few days? I have a base very far out but the coords are somewhat obvious and the residence expired, need to get some stuff off of it

Read full topic

item.title: Who is furthest from spawn?
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

PuppyClubber:

i don’t think i’m anywhere near 10k, but I’m just curious why we’re putting on a border?

The farther out you are in the map the more memory it takes. This is what overloads the server and eventually causes it to crash because he needs to put more memory towards the server. Bordering it is a good idea.

Read full topic

item.title: Who is furthest from spawn?
item.dc:creator: @omgilikepie omgilikepie
item.description:
@omgilikepie wrote:

Since minecraft was updated to 1.8.1 the chunks for the newer version will not replace the ones that have already been “seen” I guess you could say. So you have to move away so that the new chunks with the new stuff will load.

Read full topic

I’m only about a thousand away so that works for me
